name: Treat Team (demo?)
description:
(NOTE: This game looks better in fullscreen mode. To do so, click the expand button in the bottom right corner of the game!)

(ANOTHER NOTE: This game will work on desktop browsers, but MAY NOT work on mobile device browsers)

Hey there!

This is Bluebird Studios LLC, and we're releasing this little demo for our upcoming game - Treat Team! 

In this little game demo, we have 8 puzzle levels for you to enjoy! And, actually, there are 2 different game play modes because we are trying to test out different things and see what people like best!

That way, in our official release of Treat Team, we'll have a game that people will really enjoy and have fun with wherever they are!

So, please, enjoy this fun little demo and please fill out the Google Forms survey at the end of it! Your feedback will be INVALUABLE to the future of our game!

Thank you and have a great time!
